question: if i don't want prominent abdominals but i want to loose my chub what can i do?
question_content: i am a vegetarian and i would like to not have extra flabs of skin folding on each other when i sit.

answers.answer_content:
What you want to do is eat your vegetarian food but keep it high in protein and low in fat. You can try fish, but if your a super vegetarian then I would suggest something along the lines of tofu or lots of beans, this with a good dose of assorted vegetables, steamed carrots, broccoli, cauliflower, salads etc. And you should be good. 

To loose that extra bit of weight I would suggest a supplement, you have probably heard of bodily detox? Essentialy it takes out all the chemicals out of your bodily (which are processed through colon & liver) and sets it back into it's natural state. This way you will loose weight because your body will be functioning at it's highest state all the time. I used this free trial, I mean hey, you have nothing to loose by just trying it right?
